Flow.description: Display Offers - Master Flow for Online & In Branch **** Not filtering out Year of Collateral

formulas.name: ResultDescriptionFormula
formulas.expression: IF ({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfLoanAmountManualReview} , ", Loan Amount Above Auto Approval", "")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfCreditScoreManualReview} , ", Credit Score Under Auto Approval", "") + IF ({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfCreditScoreBelowPolicy}, ", Credit Score is Below Policy" ,"") + IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountofDTIabovePolicy}, ", DTI too high" ,"") + IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfLoanAmountsOutOfPolicy}, ", Loan Amount does not meet policy" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfBankruptcyOutofPolicy}, ", Bankruptcy flagged" ,"") + IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountofLienPositionOutsidePolicy}, ", Lien Position does not meet policy" ,"") + IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountofCollateralTypeFailure}, ", Collateral type does not match policy" ,"") + IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountofLTVOutsidePolicy}, ", LTV is outside of policy" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfCreditReportNeedsReview}, ", Credit Report Needs Review" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfCreditScoresMissing}, ", Credit Score is missing" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfDuplicateAppFlags}, ", Duplicate Applications Detected" ,"") + IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOf30DayLates}, ", 30 Day Lates are out of Policy" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOf60DayLates}, ", 60 Day Lates are out of Policy" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOf90DayLates}, ", 90 Day Lates are out of Policy" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfMultipleCollateralPledged}, ", Multiple Collateral Pledged- Pricing was based on highest amount pledged" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfApplicantUnderAge}, ", Applicant is under age" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCollateralAgeFailureCounter}, ", Collateral year does not match policy" ,"")+ IF({!TotalCounter} = {!ResultCountOfMileageOutOfRange}, ", Collateral mileage is out of policy range" ,"")

Flow.label: Display_Offers_Master_OA_IB
